name: Radisson Blu Hotel Amsterdam Airport

reviews.text: I really enjoyed my stay here. Being near the airport you would think it would be very loud, this is not the case. We were in a room facing the airport and we didn't hear a thing.
reviews.title: Great Place to Stay

likes.disliked: — If you aren't prepared to travel into Amsterdam don't stay here

reviews.text: Staff were helpful and even helped us learn a bit of Dutch.
reviews.title: No problems, great staff

likes.liked: — Comfortable, clean, great staff, good facilities

reviews.text: Would have been nice to have 2 robes but that is my only complaint
reviews.title: Large rooms, close to airport

reviews.text: I overnighted here last Feb/March for work purposes. I would not have chosen to stay in an airport hotel, but due to a large car exhibition at the time, the city centre hotels seemed to be booked out.
reviews.title: nice hotel but far away from city center

likes.disliked: — location is far away from city center

reviews.text: I had no problems with the free shuttle from the airport - they will email you the timetable if you ask about it.
reviews.title: A series of annoyances

reviews.text: I checked in and then went into Amsterdam for the evening. I was given a schedule for their shuttle from the airport/train station back to the hotel. When I arrived for the shuttle there was already a crowd of over 40 people waiting for a 25 passenger shuttle. Obviously, the driver needed to make the 20 minute round trip to get back ASAP, but instead, he waited over 30 minutes to leave. Despite asking when the next shuttle was coming, he just disappeared into the airport. I called the hotel, and they said they were sending another shuttle. After waiting a total of over 70 minutes, a shuttle (the same one with the same driver) came.
reviews.title: Not recommended

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: When I arrived at the hotel, they admitted that they could not send another shuttle because they only had one driver - no explanation why they told me (and others who called) another was already on the way.
reviews.title: it was ok

reviews.text: BTW, they did say they would have paid the taxi fee if I had taken one. But risky in my opinion.
reviews.title: Get a Deal and Stay

reviews.text: To top off the evening, the "free" internet access in the room did not work even after talking to the help desk.
reviews.title: Good airport hotel, with potential as a base for Amsterdam

reviews.text: The hotel is about 7km from the airport. On arrival we found the room to be spacious if not a little dated in terms of decor. The bathroom was also spacious with everything you would need.
reviews.title: Lovely airport hotel

reviews.text: It was bliss getting back to this lovely relaxing hotel to unwind after a long day in busy Amsterdam. Very clean and quiet/cosy rooms, the bed was so comfortable(main thing right!) Very friendly staff and the breakfast is superb! Frequent shuttles to Aeroport and trains to Centraal station take about 15 to 20mn, easy access. This is excelent value and you will not be dissapointed. I will use it again the next time.
reviews.title: Excellent value! Excellent hotel!

likes.liked: — The comfort, staff and shuttle service

reviews.text: Cost the price of a motel and got 5* service i na 5* hotel.
reviews.title: Top Hotel

reviews.text: Big room (business class) , coffee, robe etc - everything. Service was 1st rate. checkin people were mego friendly, only disapointment was having to leave at 5.30 for a flight!
reviews.title: Worst experience since quite a while

reviews.text: Not very friendly check-in, standard rooms are very small and dark. After getting through to the Duty Manager got then an upgrade to a so called "business class" room. Coffe machine was broken and they had to bring three replacements until it worked. Rooms overall not very clean either. DEFINITIVELY NO VALUE FOR THE MONEY.
reviews.title: Nice hotel, dated room

likes.disliked: — Room was a little tired looking

reviews.text: Stayed here for a two day course, room was a little shabby, needs a little updating, very dark inside. Generally pretty clean and functional though, free wi-fi internet access throughout the hotel.
reviews.title: Limited Shuttle Service; Poor location, but nice rooms

reviews.text: Only stayed for one night, arrived late and left early.
reviews.title: OK for an Airport Hotel

reviews.text: Evergthing looked a bit tired, including me.
reviews.title: My new choice for Amsterdam

reviews.text: Room was clean and the bed comfortable, staff were fine.
reviews.title: Good for short stay over.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Nothing special.
reviews.title: Efficient. Convenient. Clean.

reviews.text: OK for an overnight stay if you don't want to trek into the centre.
reviews.title: Good location for Airport

reviews.text: My family and I stayed here for one night during a layover. I've got a gold card with their program Club Carlson and one of the benefits is a free room upgrade. At check-in this was refused and instead they wanted to sell me a package with upgrade + breakfast. So no recognition of the listed benefits.
reviews.title: Refused entitled upgrade

reviews.text: Apart from this the hotel was ok, I wasn't very impressed with the room, it was pretty standard business hotel. The shuttle took about 10 minutes and arrived on time.
reviews.title: Good business airport hotel with free shuttle, good breakfast,friendly service

reviews.text: I would rate this hotel 4/5 had it not been for the bad check-in experience.
reviews.title: Great hotel with frequent shuttle service

reviews.text: The deal I got was very good value.pleasant staff at reception and restaurant. Food at restaurant average but expensive. Bar also quite expensive but not unexpected. Rooms are quiet, clean and modern, beds are comfortable. Nice breakfast buffet
reviews.title: Was a good hotel but not improving...

reviews.text: It is located a few kilometers from Schiphol airport but you don't hear jets inside. I had my office also at Boeing Avenue so it was the nearest hotel from the place where I used to do my job.
reviews.title: OK if you need to stay close to the airport

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked a park-sleep-fly package for our trip to Mexico. The hotel is located in a business park close to Schiphol airport. The free hotel shuttle (big bus) brings you to the airport every half hour. The parking is covered, it's not a closed parking garage but parking is under the building and you can only access it through the hotel gate. As part of the park-sleep-fly we could leave our car in the parking lot for the entire length of our vacation in Mexico. Very convenient.
reviews.title: Does the job
Conveniently next to the airport
reviews.text: Friendly welcome at reception.
The rooms are clean and quiet, a bit old style but I think they are currently renovating rooms.
reviews.title: Relaxed and Comfortable

reviews.text: Very nice breakfast buffet.
reviews.title: Nice AirPort hotel

reviews.text: We had a very relaxed start of our holidays by staying here.
reviews.title: Convenient hotel for short stay

reviews.text: I have been here a couple of times-- primarily because there are office parks within a couple minutes walk that have important customers housed there. It is a more pricey hotel than I would usually choose when looking to stay at an Airport. To some extent you get what you pay for- ie an upscale feel. But you feel like every bit of food and beverage is costly and if you stay there more than one night this will add up fast.
reviews.title: Stay here if near your customer but otherwise not a great value

reviews.text: They offer a reliable shuttle to and from the airport for free.
reviews.title: Solid Hotel

reviews.text: There is free wifi throughout the facility and it worked fine for me.
reviews.title: Awful food, tired looking rooms and poor service
Average hotel, great food.
reviews.text: Breakfast is 25 Euros if its not included in your rate.
Room was clean, a good size and perfectly functional.
reviews.title: Good airport hotel

reviews.text: International class airport hotels are much of a muchness, but the service level at this property was excellent, and the lunch buffet was downright superb. Plus, for convention-goers, the snack and coffee facilities were excellent. The only downside is the weak beer selection at the bar (which, being an isolated hotel, was the only drinking option)...
reviews.title: A solid performer

likes.disliked: — Lame beer selection at the bar, wifi outage for half of the trip

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I've been at the Hotel for 1 night.. waiting the flight for Los Angeles at 8 a.m.
reviews.title: Confortable rooms... poor shuttle

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is located about 10-15 minutes from the airport and it's connected through a bus shuttle. The first thing to remark is that the shuttle service is unreliable. If it is full you've to wait the next bus (30 minutes). If you have to reach the airport this is not the best.
reviews.title: Amazing!

reviews.text: Anyway, a part from this, the hotel is confortable, the rooms are nice, the bar is modern and the reception high tech.
reviews.title: Radisson SAS Amsterdam Airport - Amazing!

likes.disliked: — The fitness center closing very early

reviews.title: Great Hotel, especially for business
reviews.text: As I took a very good offer I can be satisfied about this stay.

description: The hotel features three different room styles: Oriental, Scandinavian & Maritime; located at Schiphol Rijk; 10 min to AMS Arpt.
